author: By DAVID EGGERT Associated Press
title: Whitmer to extend stay-home order; state furloughs workers
description: LANSING, Mich. (AP) — Gov. Gretchen Whitmer made clear Wednesday that she will extend her stay-at-home order beyond April 30 and that some form of it will be in effect for a “long time” in Michigan, hinting that people age…
content:
Whitmer's administration notified state employees of temporary layoffs that were necessitated by a drop in tax revenues due to the pandemic.
The state will furlough 2,900, or about 6%, of its roughly 48,000 workers for two weeks to save about $5 million. Off… [+1014 chars]
